You have defeated the Demon King! Job well done!

And the title ‘King’ is now bestowed upon you!

Welcome, \n[1]! I have summoned you here today on a short
notice because the Demon King is threatening to take over
You are one of my finest warriors, so I believe you are up to
Take what’s inside the treasure chest to aid you on your
quest. Then head to the town south of here and gather
information on how to reach the Demon King!
Talk to the soldiers here to learn how to navigate.
The people of this world are counting on you! Now, go forth!

To run, press and hold \I[18] / \I[22] to move faster.
To talk to someone, walk up to them, face them, and press
To walk around, use \I[24] to move up, \I[25] to move left, \I[26] to
move down, and \I[27] to move right.

When you grab the item from the chest, make sure you equip
the sword and armor before you leave.
Do you know how to do that?
Go to the menu by pressing \I[18] / \I[22], go down to 'Equip' and
Select the item you wish to equip by pressing  \I[16] / \I[20].
You can also 'Optimize' your equipment, which automatically
Go to the menu by pressing \I[29], go down to 'Equip' and select
Select the item you wish to equip by pressing  \I[31].

\n[1], I do not deny that you are strong, but you must become
To do that, you must go outside and fight enemies. They will
appear randomly as you walk around.
When you fight monsters, you gain experience points [EXP]
and gold [G]. Once you receive enough EXP, you will level up
You can use the gold the monsters drop to buy items and
stronger equipment in the town south of here.
The higher your level, the more EXP you need to gain to
Do you know how to check your stats?
Press \I[18] / \I[22] to open the menu. Go down to 'Status' and
Press \I[29] to open the menu. Go down to 'Status' and select it
There you will see your Health Points [HP] and Magic Points
[MP]. Your 'Current EXP' is the amount of EXP you currently
have and 'To Next Level' is how much you need.
Below that, you will see your equipment.
Next to that, it will show your 'Attack', 'Defense',
HP (Hit Points) represents the maximum amount of damage the
MP (Magic Points) represents the maximum power the
character can use for magic skills.
Attack Power affects the amount of damage dealt to
Defense Power affects the amount of damage taken when
M. Attack (Magic Attack Power) affects the power of the
M. Defense (Magic Defense Power) affects the amount of
damage the character takes when hit by an opponent's
Agility affects the order in which characters attack
Luck affects the chances of being affected by status
When you level up, you will learn 'Magic'.
Magic can do things such as heal HP, cure status ailments
such as poison, and attack enemies.
You can heal yourself in battle and in the overworld.
Do you know how to use your magic?
Press \I[18] / \I[22] to open the menu. Go down to 'Skill' and select
Choose which magic you wish to use with \I[16] / \I[20].
You can use healing magic in battle and outside battle. But
attack magic can only be used in battle.
Press \I[29] to open the menu. Go down to 'Skill' and select it
Choose which magic you wish to use with \I[31].
You can use healing magic in battle and outside battle. But
attack magic can only be used in battle.
If you've taken the items from the chest, you will notice
Potions are what you need when your HP is low.
Do you know how to use a potion?
Press \I[18] / \I[22] to open the menu. Go down to 'Item' and
Press \I[30] to open the menu. Go down to 'Item' and select it
There, you can use your potion and any other item you wish
Once you leave here, you will be in the overworld. There you
will spend a lot of time fighting monsters.
If you fight a monster and win, you will gain EXP and gold.
But if your HP reaches 0, you will die.
Do you need a little guidance on random encounters and
When you walk around in the overworld, a monster will
You will have a choice to 'Fight' or 'Escape'.
If you are running low on HP, the enemy is too strong, or
if you just don't want to fight, you can escape.
However, there is a chance the monster can block your
path, and it will use one of your turns.
You will have a choice to 'Attack', use a 'Skill', 'Guard', and
Press \I[16] / \I[20] on 'Attack' to attack the monster.
Press \I[16] / \I[20] on the magic you want to use. In battle, you
can use healing magic or attack magic.

Press \I[16] / \I[20] on 'Item' to use an item.
Here you can choose which item you want to use.
Press \I[31] on 'Attack' to attack the monster.

Press \I[31] on 'Item' to use an item.
Here you can choose which item you want to use.
Once you have done what you need to do, you will want to
save your progress so you don’t lose all of your hard work.
Do you know how to save and load your data?
Press \I[18] / \I[22] to open the menu. Go down to 'Save' and
Press \I[16] / \I[20] on the file you wish to save on. Your file also
Press \I[16] / \I[20] on the file you wish to save to. Your file also
When you start the game, press \I[16] / \I[20] on 'Continue'.
Press \I[16] / \I[20] on the file you wish to load.
